Name: Karen Cristina
description:
Karen Cristina is 26 years old. She is single and lives in her parents' home in the canton of San Vicente, a place of beautiful, exotic beaches and a varied, rich gastronomy. It receives a lot of tourists from Ecuador and from abroad.

She is a hardworking woman looking for ways to earn a living, so she can cover her expenses and also help provide for her family despite the fact that rural life is difficult since they don't have basic services like education and health.

She and her family make a living from agriculture. She has several hectares with passion fruit crops. She hopes to improve these crops with the help of loans and improve the quality of her production.

She also raises pigs at home and sells them for a very good return.

This loan is for organic fertilizers and insecticides to improve her production.
